TEMPLATE

    <%@ Page Language="C#" %>
    <!DOCTYPE html>

SCRIPT PART

    <script runat="server"> //run the code on server
         private void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
         {
              Product saleProduct = new Product("Kitchen Garbage", 49.99M, "garbage.jpg");
              Response.Write(saleProduct.GetHtml());
         }
    </script>

HTML PART

    <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" >
    <head>
         <title>Product Test</title>
    </head>
    <body></body>
    </html>

DESCRIPTION

  1. Page_Load event for loading our page
  2. Write method for loading Html from GetHtml method
